title: suzanne5223
author: suzanne5223
created_time: May 08, 2022, 01:32:06 PMLast edit: September 25, 2023, 10:53:14 PM by suzanne5223

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Your whole Promoted campaigns section might be a little misleading. I know that these are campaigns that you were selected to wear their signature, but a company looking for a manager might think you managed these campaigns. My personal opinion, you need to be clear that you have not managed a campaign.

comments.author: suzanne5223
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on June 14, 2022, 12:54:25 AMYour whole Promoted campaigns section might be a little misleading. I know that these are campaigns that you were selected to wear their signature, but a company looking for a manager might think you managed these campaigns. My personal opinion, you need to be clear that you have not managed a campaign.Before this Ann thread was created I study how others create their own without any issues and with no misleading. Yes, the promoted campaign are projects I once and currently work for under another manager which is the reason why it was tagged "Promoted Campaigns" not "Manage Campaigns"

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: suzanne5223 on June 15, 2022, 02:59:00 AMQuote from: yahoo62278 on June 14, 2022, 12:54:25 AMYour whole Promoted campaigns section might be a little misleading. I know that these are campaigns that you were selected to wear their signature, but a company looking for a manager might think you managed these campaigns. My personal opinion, you need to be clear that you have not managed a campaign.Before this Ann thread was created I study how others create their own without any issues and with no misleading. Yes, the promoted campaign are projects I once and currently work for under another manager which is the reason why it was tagged "Promoted Campaigns" not "Manage Campaigns"yes, yahoo62278 is right. and I thought this was your portfolio of campaigns you managed, then I finally noticed some campaign signatures that you certainly didn’t manage.I don't know what you saw and studied at other ANNs, but certainly, no manager emphasized in the portfolio of campaigns in which he was only a participant. In your place I would correct that, that is, delete the "promoted campaign" because it is not in any relation to the management.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on June 24, 2022, 12:40:13 AM no manager emphasized in the portfolio of campaigns in which he was only a participant.You are wrong though I didn’t use since this makes no sense. A lot of CM used promoted campaign. I never got what's the relation between promoted campaign and CM.

comments.author: STT
comments.body: I like the artwork design alot, very bling

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: I believe Suzanne5223 is among the best talented managers I respected so much in the community in items of steady payment and honest till the end of the project. Those that tested your service in the past will still like to enjoy your service again, because you are good in managing bounty campaign and signature campaign.

comments.author: Maestro75
comments.body: Quote from: Zanab247 on July 31, 2022, 02:08:46 PMI believe Suzanne5223 is among the best talented managers I respected so much in the community in items of steady payment and honest till the end of the project. Those that tested your service in the past will still like to enjoy your service again, because you are good in managing bounty campaign and signature campaign.It is not bad to say good things about people. But do not say things that are not true about them because you want them to feel good. That will be misleading. Suzanne5223 has never managed any bounties or campaigns in the past. He is just starting up.

comments.author: suzanne5223
comments.body: Quote from: Maestro75 on August 17, 2022, 05:53:57 AMQuote from: Zanab247 on July 31, 2022, 02:08:46 PMI believe Suzanne5223 is among the best talented managers I respected so much in the community in items of steady payment and honest till the end of the project. But do not say things that are not true about them because you want them to feel good. That will be misleading. Suzanne5223 has never managed any bounties or campaigns in the past. He is just starting up.Meanwhile, Suzanne5223 has always worked behind the scheme before taking a further step.

comments.author: jayce
comments.body: Same with yahoo62278 and examplens, it misleads people who think that you managed those campaigns. People and your other potential clients won't be impressed when they find out those are not your own campaigns.
